structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: If the city legislative body finds that the bonds authorized will be insufficient to accomplish the purpose desired, additional bonds may be authorized and issued in the same manner.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 2741L-14, 2741L-36.
